Object Detector Module¶

Subpackages

Submodules

src.obj_detector.detect module

src.obj_detector.detect.detect(model, dataloader, output_path, img_size, conf_thres, nms_thres)¶

Inferences images with model.

Parameters

  • model (models.Darknet) – Model for inference

  • dataloader (DataLoader) – Dataloader provides the batches of images to inference

  • output_path (str) – Path to output directory

  • img_size (int, optional) – Size of each image dimension for yolo, defaults to 416

  • conf_thres (float, optional) – Object confidence threshold, defaults to 0.5

  • nms_thres (float, optional) – IOU threshold for non-maximum suppression, defaults to 0.5

Returns

List of detections. The coordinates are given for the padded image that is provided by the dataloader. Use utils.rescale_boxes to transform them into the desired input image coordinate system before its transformed by the dataloader), List of input image paths

Return type

[Tensor], [str]

src.obj_detector.detect.detect_directory(model_path, weights_path, img_path, classes, output_path, batch_size=8, img_size=416, n_cpu=8, conf_thres=0.5, nms_thres=0.5)¶

Detects objects on all images in specified directory and saves output images with drawn detections.

Parameters

  • model_path (str) – Path to model definition file (.cfg)

  • weights_path (str) – Path to weights or checkpoint file (.weights or .pth)

  • img_path (str) – Path to directory with images to inference

  • classes ([str]) – List of class names

  • output_path (str) – Path to output directory

  • batch_size (int, optional) – Size of each image batch, defaults to 8

  • img_size (int, optional) – Size of each image dimension for yolo, defaults to 416

  • n_cpu (int, optional) – Number of cpu threads to use during batch generation, defaults to 8

  • conf_thres (float, optional) – Object confidence threshold, defaults to 0.5

  • nms_thres (float, optional) – IOU threshold for non-maximum suppression, defaults to 0.5

src.obj_detector.detect.detect_image(model, image, img_size=416, conf_thres=0.5, nms_thres=0.5)¶

Inferences one image with model.

Parameters

  • model (models.Darknet) – Model for inference

  • image (nd.array) – Image to inference

  • img_size (int, optional) – Size of each image dimension for yolo, defaults to 416

  • conf_thres (float, optional) – Object confidence threshold, defaults to 0.5

  • nms_thres (float, optional) – IOU threshold for non-maximum suppression, defaults to 0.5

Returns

Detections on image with each detection in the format: [x1, y1, x2, y2, confidence, class]

Return type

nd.array

src.obj_detector.detect.run()¶

src.obj_detector.infer module

src.obj_detector.models module

class src.obj_detector.models.Darknet(config_path)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

YOLOv3 object detection model

forward(x)¶

Defines the computation performed at every call.

Should be overridden by all subclasses.

Note

Although the recipe for forward pass needs to be defined within this function, one should call the Module instance afterwards instead of this since the former takes care of running the registered hooks while the latter silently ignores them.

load_darknet_weights(weights_path)¶

Parses and loads the weights stored in ‘weights_path’

save_darknet_weights(path, cutoff=- 1)¶

@:param path - path of the new weights file @:param cutoff - save layers between 0 and cutoff (cutoff = -1 -> all are saved)

training: bool¶

  • weights_path (str) – Path to weights or checkpoint file (.weights or .pth)
